channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Breaking down Trump's pre-Super Bowl interview. And, highlights from the big game
item.description: President Trump became the first sitting president to attend a Super Bowl last night, and fans had mixed reactions. Plus, highlights from the big game and the best (and worst) Super Bowl commercials.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump became the first sitting president to attend a Super Bowl last night, and fans had mixed reactions. Plus, highlights from the big game and the best (and worst) Super Bowl commercials.

(Image credit: FOX News Channel’s Bret Baier)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Why many Republicans think shrinking Medicaid will make it better
item.description: Republicans proposals to change the public health insurance program for low-income and disabled Americans could amount to more than $2 trillion of cuts over the next decade.
item.content:encoded:
Republicans proposals to change the public health insurance program for low-income and disabled Americans could amount to more than $2 trillion of cuts over the next decade.

(Image credit: Valerie Plesch/Bloomberg)
item.dc:creator: Ryan Levi

item.title: Palestinian refugees in Syria have a message for Gazans: Don't leave your land
item.description: Palestinians fled the 1948 Mideast War and took refuge in neighboring Syria. After 77 years, they're still waiting to go back. They are telling Palestinians in Gaza to stay put.
item.content:encoded:
Palestinians fled the 1948 Mideast War and took refuge in neighboring Syria. After 77 years, they're still waiting to go back. They are telling Palestinians in Gaza to stay put.

(Image credit: Louai Beshara)
item.dc:creator: Greg Myre

item.title: Chinese counter-tariffs to kick in as Trump threatens more to come
item.description: The tariffs from China range from 10% to 15% and are applied to crude oil, liquefied natural gas, farm machinery and select other products from the U.S.
item.content:encoded:
The tariffs from China range from 10% to 15% and are applied to crude oil, liquefied natural gas, farm machinery and select other products from the U.S.

(Image credit: Andy Wong)
item.dc:creator: John Ruwitch

item.title: Ecuador's conservative incumbent and a leftist lawyer advance to presidential runoff
item.description: Ecuador will choose its next president in a April runoff election after conservative incumbent Daniel Noboa and leftist lawyer Luisa González garnered enough votes Sunday to beat 14 other candidates.
item.content:encoded:
Ecuador will choose its next president in a April runoff election after conservative incumbent Daniel Noboa and leftist lawyer Luisa González garnered enough votes Sunday to beat 14 other candidates.

(Image credit: Dolores Ochoa)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: See Spot run: Photos from a historic Puppy Bowl
item.description: The pups from Team Fluff weren't the only winners. See freeze-frame highlights from the 21st edition of the Puppy Bowl.
item.content:encoded:
The pups from Team Fluff weren't the only winners. See freeze-frame highlights from the 21st edition of the Puppy Bowl.

(Image credit: Ryan Muir)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman

item.title: Kendrick Lamar brought West Coast hip hop, Uncle Sam and Serena Williams to the Super Bowl
item.description: With the biggest captive audience of his career, Lamar's performance conjures a medley of hits that spans his 15-year discography, and featured R&B star SZA as a special guest.
item.content:encoded:
With the biggest captive audience of his career, Lamar's performance conjures a medley of hits that spans his 15-year discography, and featured R&B star SZA as a special guest.

(Image credit: Cindy Ord)
item.dc:creator: Sidney Madden

item.title: The best (and worst) Super Bowl commercials this year
item.description: At a time when every news alert seems to deliver a seismic jolt about the world, these ads mostly touch on safe subjects we expect in Big Game commercials: Nostalgia. Comedy. Celebrities. Patriotism. Poignant humanism.
item.content:encoded:
At a time when every news alert seems to deliver a seismic jolt about the world, these ads mostly touch on safe subjects we expect in Big Game commercials: Nostalgia. Comedy. Celebrities. Patriotism. Poignant humanism.

(Image credit: Screenshot from Dunkin' ad)
item.dc:creator: Eric Deggans

item.title: Bestselling novelist Tom Robbins dies at 92
item.description: Robbins dazzled readers with the whimsy and imagination in his books, including Jitterbug Perfume, Skinny Legs and All and Even Cowgirls Get the Blues.
item.content:encoded: Robbins dazzled readers with the whimsy and imagination in his books, including Jitterbug Perfume, Skinny Legs and All and Even Cowgirls Get the Blues.
item.dc:creator: Tom Vitale

item.title: Trump defends Elon Musk as 'terrific' during Super Bowl interview
item.description: President Trump calls federal courts blocking Elon Musk "crazy," and predicted the Kansas City Chiefs would win Super Bowl LIX.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump calls federal courts blocking Elon Musk "crazy," and predicted the Kansas City Chiefs would win Super Bowl LIX.

(Image credit: Fox News)
item.dc:creator: Luke Garrett
